metadata.synopsis: Panicked AD of customers in Felogyr's Fireworks when one or more explosive barrels are detonated upstairs. Avery tries to calm them.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Explode any of the runepowder barrels on the middle or top floor of Felogyr's Fireworks

0.speaker: Robbin Datherswick
0.text: Gods, what kind of firework was that?

1.speaker: Avery Sonshal
1.text: Where there is innovation, there may be a few backfires - it's all part of the process!
1.context: NodeContext: Trying to reassure his customers despite the explosion upstairs
